documentation.description: Forces any buffered data to be processed by the job.

job_id.description: The name of the job to flush

calc_interim.description: Calculates interim results for the most recent bucket or all buckets within the latency period

start.description: When used in conjunction with calc_interim, specifies the range of buckets on which to calculate interim results

end.description: When used in conjunction with calc_interim, specifies the range of buckets on which to calculate interim results

advance_time.description: Advances time to the given value generating results and updating the model for the advanced interval

skip_time.description: Skips time to the given value without generating results or updating the model for the skipped interval
